backend/main.mo: Defines actor with profile, job, application, messaging, rating, and notification types plus login and access control logic using multiple maps for storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure for tracking implemented features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for all major frontend components, pages, hooks, styles, and configuration files.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing routing, identity login flow, user setup, and conditional portals with global layout elements.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Candid: Displays and edits the candidate’s profile, including CV upload, department selection, and profile update handling.
frontend/src/components/candidate/ChatTa: Messaging interface showing conversation partners and chat messages with ability to send new messages.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Employ: Placeholder employer directory card indicating the feature is coming soon.
frontend/src/components/candidate/JobSea: Job search UI with filtering, job details display, and job application flow using the user's CV.
frontend/src/components/employer/Candida: Employer tool for searching candidates by department and location and displaying matching profiles.
frontend/src/components/employer/Employe: Provides a chat UI for employers to view conversation partners, select a user, display messages, and send new messages.
Displays and edits employer profile fields such as company info, with save and loading states.
frontend/src/components/employer/JobMana: Manages employer job postings including creation, editing, deletion, and viewing applications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding, smooth-scroll links, contact info, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header handling login/logout, navigation, user menu, admin access, and mobile menu with site branding.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating candidate or employer profiles with form fields, file upload, and registration logic.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp contact button that appears after a delay and opens a predefined chat link.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Defines static contact information including phone, WhatsApp, email, and location.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for login, user profiles, candidate/employer actions, jobs, applications, messages, and notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark mode, global styles, and animations for a floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the About page.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPortal.tsx: Implements an admin interface with authentication, analytics, profile/job management, and delete/export actions.
frontend/src/pages/CandidatePortal.tsx: Renders candidate tabs for job search, employers, chat, and profile management.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerPortal.tsx: Provides employer tabs for job management, candidate search, chat, and profile settings.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays marketing content, service categories, and login flows for candidates and employers.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Shows the platform’s privacy policy with sections on data collection, usage, and security.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the Services page.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: React page rendering the Terms of Service with cards covering agreements, account rules, and acceptable use. Primarily static content with UI components and styling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking schema version, features, and pending requests related to updating the Landing Page 'Get Started' button behavior.
